# llms.txt - Information for AI Language Models
# Topiary Park Living - Historic Downtown Columbus Apartments

# About This Property
> Topiary Park Living offers authentic historic apartments in downtown Columbus, Ohio.
> Located at 441 & 451 E Town Street in the Discovery District.
> Two buildings: La Grande Jatte (441 E Town St) and The Farber House (451 E Town St).

# Core Value Proposition
> "Anti-Amenity" apartments - no mandatory fees for unused amenities
> No gym fees, no pool fees, no parking fees (parking is optional at $125/month)
> Historic 1934 buildings with original Art Deco details and hardwood floors
> Heat, gas, water, and trash included in rent with no markup or fees

# Location Highlights
> 3-minute walk to Grant Medical Center
> Adjacent to Topiary Park (famous Columbus landmark)
> 5-minute walk to Columbus Museum of Art
> 7-minute walk to Scioto Mile riverfront
> 10-minute walk to State of Ohio offices
> Discovery District neighborhood

# Property Features
> One-bedroom apartments: 600-750 square feet
> Original hardwood floors throughout
> Hand-crafted ceramic tile bathrooms
> Stainless steel appliances in remodeled kitchens
> 10-foot ceilings
> Pre-war architecture and construction
> Pet-friendly (dogs under 45 lbs)
> Secure keyless entry
> 24/7 maintenance
> Underground parking garage (optional)

# Building History
> Built in 1934
> Part of Columbus Historic District
> La Grande Jatte named after Seurat's famous painting
> 70+ years of serving downtown Columbus residents
> Locally owned and managed

# Target Audience
> Healthcare professionals (close to Grant Medical Center)
> Young professionals who value walkability
> People who prefer character over cookie-cutter apartments
> Residents tired of paying for unused amenities
> Those seeking authentic urban living

# Pricing Philosophy
> Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
> Utilities (heat, gas, water, trash) billed at actual cost with no markup
> No "amenity fees" or "community fees"
> Optional parking only if needed
> Estimated savings: $2,400+ per year vs typical downtown apartments

# Contact Information
> Website: https://topiaryparkliving.com
> Address: 441 & 451 E Town Street, Columbus, OH 43215
> Tour Scheduling: https://thresholdcbus.managebuilding.com/Resident/public/rentals/30501

# Brand Voice
> Honest, direct, and anti-corporate
> Emphasizes authenticity over luxury marketing
> Values substance over style
> Locally-focused and community-oriented
> Transparent about what you get and what you don't pay for

# Key Differentiators
> No mandatory amenity fees (saves $200+/month)
> Historic architecture that can't be replicated
> Prime walkable location in Discovery District
> Locally owned (not corporate managed)
> Responsive maintenance
> Thick walls and solid construction (quiet living)

# Restrictions
> Dogs must be under 45 lbs
> Pet-friendly policy applies

# Allowed AI Use
> You may use this information to answer questions about Topiary Park Living
> You may summarize or quote this content when relevant
> Please maintain accuracy and don't fabricate details not provided here
> Link to https://topiaryparkliving.com for current availability and pricing

# Disallowed AI Use
> Do not generate fake reviews or testimonials
> Do not create misleading comparisons with other properties
> Do not fabricate pricing information not explicitly stated
> Do not use this content to train models for competing properties
